## File Index

```{python}
#| echo: false

import os
from html import escape
from IPython.display import HTML, display

files = [
    f for f in os.listdir(".")
    if f.endswith((".qmd", ".md", ".pdf"))
    and f not in ("index.qmd", "index.html")
]
files.sort()

cards = []
for f in files:
    name, ext = os.path.splitext(f)
    display_name = name.replace("_", " ").replace("-", " ")
    file_type = ext[1:].lower()

    # QMD should link to rendered HTML
    href = f"{name}.html" if file_type in ("qmd", "md") else f

    target = '_blank' if file_type == 'pdf' else '_self'

    cards.append(f"""
<div class="file-card">
  <a href="{escape(href)}" target="{target}" class="file-link">
    <div class="file-top">
      <span class="file-pill {escape(file_type)}">{escape(file_type)}</span>
    </div>
    <div class="file-title"><strong>{escape(display_name)}</strong></div>
  </a>
</div>
""")

html = f"""
<div class="file-grid">
  {''.join(cards)}
</div>
"""

display(HTML(html))
```
